The user creates a wall of multiple layers of vacuum that are stacked on top of each other like a [[wikipedia:Mille-feuille|mille-feuille]]. This technique can be used to provide additional support to other [[Shield of Sand|defensive technique]]s.

[[fr:Fûton - Bourrasque à Multicouche]]
